meta.description: Optimize the purchase of regular and hybrid vans to minimize the total number of vans while meeting delivery and pollution constraints.

sets.name: VAN_TYPES
sets.description: Types of vans available for purchase

params.name: delivery_capacity
params.description: Number of packages each type of van can deliver per day

params.name: pollution
params.description: Units of pollutants produced by each type of van per day

vars.name: vans
vars.description: Number of vans to purchase of each type

objective.name: min_total_vans
objective.description: Minimize the total number of vans purchased

constraints.name: pollution_constraint
constraints.description: Total pollution produced by the vans must not exceed 7000 units per day

constraints.name: delivery_requirement
constraints.description: Total delivery capacity must be at least 20000 packages per day
